Uses of Interface
com.embeddedunveiled.serial.ISerialComHotPlugListener

  • Packages that use ISerialComHotPlugListener 
    Package Description
    com.embeddedunveiled.serial
    Encapsulates behavior and environment centered around serial port communication.
    com.embeddedunveiled.serial.internal
    Encapsulates behavior and environment required for internal use of this library in a consolidated way.

    • Uses of ISerialComHotPlugListener in com.embeddedunveiled.serial

      Methods in com.embeddedunveiled.serial with parameters of type ISerialComHotPlugListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean SerialComManager.registerHotPlugEventListener(ISerialComHotPlugListener hotPlugListener, int filterVID, int filterPID)
      This registers a listener who will be invoked whenever a USB device has been plugged or un-plugged in system.
      boolean SerialComManager.unregisterHotPlugEventListener(ISerialComHotPlugListener hotPlugListener)
      This unregisters listener and terminate native thread used for monitoring specified hot plug events.
